body.name: 4K Waterproof Digital Camera 11FT Underwater Camera Selfie Dual Screens 48MP Waterproof Camera with 32GB Card 16X Digital Zoom Auto-Focus Underwater Camera for Snorkeling
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 1 min
features: 【4K 30FPS Waterproof Camera】 The max 4K 30FPS video resolution provides more detail and clarity. It makes images look more lifelike and detailed, resulting in better color performance in captured video. 4K resolution typically has more vibrant color performance, which makes your captured video look more vivid.

【Selfie Dual-Screen Design】 This waterproof digital camera comes with front 2.7’’ and a rear 1.8’’ IPS screen, you can take pictures with all your partners in the same frame. It is also very light, portable, and easy to use. Perfect for kids at family gatherings, water parks, and vacations.The camera built-in 2s, 5s, 10s self-timer, you can never miss any shot of your wonderful life.

【Autofocus 48MP Camera】 This camera with 48MP image resolution, it can capture every moment with crisp detail and unparalleled clarity. camera has an autofocus function, half press the shutter to achieve focus, and the focus frame on the screen turns green, then fully press the shutter to take beautiful photos, beginners can also be handy.

【11FT Underwater Camera】 This camera can be submerged 11 feet underwater without a waterproof case. Before staying underwater, please be careful to ensure that the battery door is locked to waterproof into the camera, you can take it to diving, swimming, snorkeling and other activities. To take it and you will not miss any scenery you want to record.

【Warm Tips】 This camera supports micro SD card up to 128GB（include 32GB card）. New upgraded 1250mAh rechargeable battery, you never need worry about your camera is always on the way to charging. Besides, our waterproof camera for snorkeling also allows you to charge while recording. That means you don’t need to bother about running out of power while shooting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Under the Sea
reviews.reviewText: This underwater camera is a gem for any aquatic enthusiast. It's compact design and waterproof casing make is a breeze to photograph my corals underwater. The image quality is impressive, capturing their vibrant colors and intricate details. With user-friendly controls even beginners can snap amazing pictures. Overall this is a must have for anyone wanting to appreciate their aquatic ecosystems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear water pics!
reviews.reviewText: Just got back from a family trip to PR. I was so fortunate to have this camera! We got some amazing underwater pics. This camera is priced right and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little camera
reviews.reviewText: Haven't had a chance to take a lot of pictures but so far I like it. It's a very well made camera. I gave it 4 stars because the only issue I have had with it is the battery cover. It is hard to get open but I'm thinking it's because it's water proof. Thr more I use it im sure my review will change. Over all it's a good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great little camera, very user friendly. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for vacation, awesome underwater pictures!
reviews.reviewText: This waterproof camera was exactly what we needed on our family vacation. It's a great size, light enough to hold even while splashing around underwater. My kids had taken it over and they were able to easily navigate through to not only take the pictures but review and delete as needed. As I went through the photos, I was pleasantly surprised with the images they captured with this small camera. I could tell that the flash on it works great as there were a few nighttime outings and all were clear and vivid. You will need to provide your own SD card but once you insert it, it's smooth sailing easy setup and good quality pictures. This is an excellent alternative rather than using my very expensive phone underwater, I feel more confident this way. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Item arrived previously used and damaged!
reviews.reviewText: The box was previously ripped open and the battery door did not work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: Wanted an inexpensive, waterproof camera to take on a Jamaican vacation this summer with my wife. Was hoping this camera would be "good enough" to avoid carrying our phones to the beach. Boy was I surprised!After letting my teenage daughter take it to the beach this weekend to test it out, I realized that she loved it so much that I am never getting it back! :-). The photos came out great and she loved that she could take it into the water with her and her friends. It is light and easy to use. The front facing screen allowed for better selfies.Looks like I need to order a second one for my upcoming trip!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use. Does not come with memory chip.
reviews.reviewText: Doesnt come with memory chip. You will need one. Easy to use. Great for kids
